name: A Chocolate World
description:
This is 3d platformer an unusual adventure,
come inside a world of chocolates and desserts where every move can be fatal

4 LEVELS each one differs from the other..

No save point
the goal is to finish every level with absolute precision
it's challenging
it' has zero calories....
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\ tip /////////////////
PRESS ALT+ F4 to QUIT THE GAME
Press f11 to full screen mode
